DOC.brief_summary: To evaluate immunological memory pneumococcal vaccine serotypes child prim conjugate vaccine administer booster dose plain polysaccharide vaccine .
DOC.brief_title: Immune Memory Evaluation Children Following Primary Vaccination With Pneumococcal Conjugate Vaccines .
DOC.detailed_description: 2 group ( 60 per group ) , booster Pneumovax 23 prim Prevnar GSK Biologicals ' pneumococcal vaccine .
DOC.criteria: Inclusion : healthy child 1114 month old receive primary vaccination Prevnar GSK Biologicals ' pneumococcal conjugate vaccine . Exclusion : child receive plan receive investigational product , vaccine foresee protocol immune modify drug ; child receive additional pneumococcal vaccine primary study ; child disease affect immune system history seizures and/or allergic disease .
